CommandTexts.CommandText: SELECT TABLE_NAME as `Name`, case TABLE_TYPE when 'BASE TABLE' then 0 else 1 END as IsView, case WHEN TABLE_COMMENT is null then TABLE_NAME else TABLE_COMMENT END `Comments` from information_schema.`TABLES` where TABLE_SCHEMA=@database and TABLE_NAME=@table
